trans-unit.source: Load Balancer
trans-unit.target: Load Balancer

trans-unit.source: A load balancer is used when you want to scale your applications.
trans-unit.target: A load balancer is used when you want to scale your applications.

trans-unit.source: Typical deployment scenarios involve applications running on multiple VM instances.
trans-unit.target: Typical deployment scenarios involve applications running on multiple VM instances.

trans-unit.source: The VM instances are fronted by a load balancer that helps to distribute network traffic to the various instances.
trans-unit.target: The VM instances are fronted by a load balancer that helps to distribute network traffic to the various instances.

trans-unit.source: NIC's on a single VM
trans-unit.target: NIC's on a single VM

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Front end IP configuration
trans-unit.target: Front end IP configuration

trans-unit.source: a Load balancer can include one or more front end IP addresses, otherwise known as a virtual IPs (VIPs).
trans-unit.target: a Load balancer can include one or more front end IP addresses, otherwise known as a virtual IPs (VIPs).

trans-unit.source: These IP addresses serve as ingress for the traffic and can be public IP or private IP
trans-unit.target: These IP addresses serve as ingress for the traffic and can be public IP or private IP

trans-unit.source: Backend address pool
trans-unit.target: Backend address pool

trans-unit.source: these are IP addresses associated with the VM NICs to which load will be distributed
trans-unit.target: these are IP addresses associated with the VM NICs to which load will be distributed

trans-unit.source: Load balancing rules
trans-unit.target: Load balancing rules

trans-unit.source: a rule property maps a given front end IP and port combination to a set of back end IP addresses and port combination.
trans-unit.target: a rule property maps a given front end IP and port combination to a set of back end IP addresses and port combination.

trans-unit.source: With a single definition of a load balancer resource, you can define multiple load balancing rules, each rule reflecting a combination of a front end IP and port and back end IP and port associated with virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: With a single definition of a load balancer resource, you can define multiple load balancing rules, each rule reflecting a combination of a front end IP and port and back end IP and port associated with virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: The rule is one port in the front end pool to many virtual machines in the back end pool
trans-unit.target: The rule is one port in the front end pool to many virtual machines in the back end pool

trans-unit.source: Probes
trans-unit.target: Probes

trans-unit.source: probes enable you to keep track of the health of VM instances.
trans-unit.target: probes enable you to keep track of the health of VM instances.

trans-unit.source: If a health probe fails, the virtual machine instance will be taken out of rotation automatically
trans-unit.target: If a health probe fails, the virtual machine instance will be taken out of rotation automatically

trans-unit.source: Inbound NAT rules
trans-unit.target: Inbound NAT rules

trans-unit.source: NAT rules defining the inbound traffic flowing through the front end IP and distributed to the back end IP to a specific virtual machine instance.
trans-unit.target: NAT rules defining the inbound traffic flowing through the front end IP and distributed to the back end IP to a specific virtual machine instance.

trans-unit.source: NAT rule is one port in the front end pool to one virtual machine in the back end pool
trans-unit.target: NAT rule is one port in the front end pool to one virtual machine in the back end pool

trans-unit.source: Example of load balancer template in Json format:
trans-unit.target: Example of load balancer template in Json format:

trans-unit.source: Additional resources
trans-unit.target: Additional resources

trans-unit.source: Read [load balancer REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/mt163651.aspx) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Read [load balancer REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/mt163651.aspx) for more information.
